channel.title: Compiler and Run Error on VPS [PI]
channel.description:
Hi, i get this error when I compile : http://prntscr.com/1chhmq
Here is my compiler code [code]@echo off title Hack3r`s Compiler color 5d :build cls "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d Data/CompiledFiles source\server\model\items\*.java source\server\model\minigames\*.java source\server\model\npcs\*.java source\server\model\objects\*.java source\server\model\players\*.java source\server\model\players\skills\*.java source\server\model\players\packets\*.java source\server\model\shops\*.java source\server\net\*.java source\server\task\*.java source\server\util\*.java source\server\world\*.java source\server\util\log\*.java source\server\*.java source\server\clip\*.java source\server\world\map\*.java source\server\clip\region\*.java source\server\model\players\Content\*.java pause goto :build[/code]
Also I get this run error : http://prntscr.com/1chhqj
Heres my code : [code]@echo off title Hack3r Run, Deathlypvpz Initiating!... color 5d echo Loading up Hack3r's Files Please Wait! "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_21\bin/java.exe" -Xmx1300m -cp data/CompiledFiles;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code]

item.title: Compiler and Run Error on VPS [PI]
item.dc:creator: @tgm_clan tgm clan
item.description:
@tgm_clan wrote:

Hi, i get this error when I compile : http://prntscr.com/1chhmq

Here is my compiler code @echo off title Hack3r`s Compiler color 5d :build cls "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d Data/CompiledFiles source\server\model\items\*.java source\server\model\minigames\*.java source\server\model\npcs\*.java source\server\model\objects\*.java source\server\model\players\*.java source\server\model\players\skills\*.java source\server\model\players\packets\*.java source\server\model\shops\*.java source\server\net\*.java source\server\task\*.java source\server\util\*.java source\server\world\*.java source\server\util\log\*.java source\server\*.java source\server\clip\*.java source\server\world\map\*.java source\server\clip\region\*.java source\server\model\players\Content\*.java pause goto :build

Also I get this run error : http://prntscr.com/1chhqj

Heres my code : @echo off title Hack3r Run, Deathlypvpz Initiating!... color 5d echo Loading up Hack3r's Files Please Wait! "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_21\bin/java.exe" -Xmx1300m -cp data/CompiledFiles;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause
